name: Tangy Rice
keywords: balsamic vinegar, rice, vegetables, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 medium carrots, scraped and sliced 1/4 inch thick
2 to 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rice with water in a heavy-bottomed pot. Bring to boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and cook for a total of 17 minutes.
Ten minutes before rice is done, add the carrots to the rice and continue cooking; five minutes later add the mushrooms.
When rice is cooked, stir in pine nuts, vinegar and sesame oil, and stir well. Serve topped with cilantro, if desired.
